tasks.title: Add video support for URL API endpoint
tasks.description: Extend the existing URL API endpoint to accept and process video files, enabling recipe extraction from video content such as cooking tutorials and recipe demonstrations.
tasks.details:
Implementation involves:

1. **Backend API Enhancement**:
   - Modify the URL endpoint to detect video content types (mp4, avi, mov, webm, etc.)
   - Integrate video processing library (e.g., opencv-python, moviepy) for frame extraction
   - Implement video-to-text extraction using OCR on key frames or video transcription
   - Add video metadata extraction (duration, resolution, format)
   - Update request validation to accept video URLs and file uploads

2. **Video Processing Pipeline**:
   - Extract key frames at regular intervals or scene changes
   - Apply OCR to frames containing text (recipe ingredients, instructions)
   - Implement audio transcription if video contains spoken instructions
   - Combine extracted text from multiple sources (OCR + transcription)
   - Clean and structure the extracted content into recipe format

3. **API Response Enhancement**:
   - Include video metadata in response (duration, source URL, processing method)
   - Add confidence scores for extracted content
   - Provide frame timestamps for extracted text segments
   - Handle cases where no recipe content is detected

4. **Error Handling**:
   - Validate video accessibility and format support
   - Handle network timeouts for large video files
   - Implement fallback mechanisms for processing failures
   - Add appropriate error messages for unsupported formats
tasks.testStrategy:
1. **Unit Tests**:
   - Test video format detection and validation
   - Verify frame extraction functionality with sample videos
   - Test OCR accuracy on recipe text in video frames
   - Validate error handling for invalid/corrupted videos

2. **Integration Tests**:
   - Test end-to-end video processing with various video formats (mp4, webm, mov)
   - Verify API response structure includes video metadata
   - Test processing of cooking tutorial videos from popular platforms
   - Validate timeout handling for large video files

3. **Performance Tests**:
   - Measure processing time for videos of different lengths
   - Test memory usage during video processing
   - Verify cleanup of temporary files after processing

4. **Manual Testing**:
   - Process real cooking videos with visible recipe text
   - Test videos with both spoken and written recipe content
   - Verify extracted recipes are accurate and well-formatted
   - Test edge cases: videos without recipe content, very short/long videos

tasks.title: Create upload video API endpoint
tasks.description: Implement a dedicated API endpoint for direct video file uploads, enabling users to upload video files containing recipes for processing and extraction.
tasks.details:
Implementation involves:

1. **API Endpoint Creation**:
   - Create POST /api/upload/video endpoint in the appropriate router
   - Implement multipart/form-data handling for video file uploads
   - Add file size validation and limits (e.g., max 500MB)
   - Validate uploaded file types (mp4, avi, mov, webm, mkv)
   - Generate unique identifiers for uploaded videos

2. **File Storage Management**:
   - Implement temporary file storage with cleanup mechanisms
   - Add file path sanitization and security validation
   - Create storage directories with proper permissions
   - Implement file cleanup after processing completion

3. **Request/Response Models**:
   - Create VideoUploadRequest model with file validation
   - Design VideoUploadResponse with upload status and processing info
   - Add progress tracking for large file uploads
   - Include error responses for invalid files or upload failures

4. **Integration with Video Processing**:
   - Connect to existing video processing pipeline from Task 1
   - Pass uploaded file path to video processing functions
   - Handle processing status updates and results
   - Implement async processing for large video files

5. **Security and Validation**:
   - Add MIME type verification beyond file extension checking
   - Implement virus scanning if required
   - Add rate limiting for upload endpoints
   - Validate file headers to prevent malicious uploads
tasks.testStrategy:
1. **Unit Tests**:
   - Test file upload validation with various file types and sizes
   - Verify MIME type detection and security checks
   - Test file storage and cleanup mechanisms
   - Validate request/response model serialization

2. **Integration Tests**:
   - Test complete upload-to-processing workflow
   - Verify integration with video processing pipeline
   - Test error handling for corrupted or invalid files
   - Validate async processing status updates

3. **Load Testing**:
   - Test concurrent file uploads
   - Verify performance with large video files
   - Test system behavior under storage constraints

4. **Security Testing**:
   - Test with malicious file uploads
   - Verify file type spoofing protection
   - Test rate limiting effectiveness
   - Validate proper file cleanup and no data leaks

tasks.title: Add comprehensive image support with scraping, editing, and PDF display
tasks.description: Implement complete image functionality including URL image scraping, image upload/edit capabilities in demo mode, and image display in PDF exports.
tasks.details:
Implementation involves:

1. **Backend Image Scraping Enhancement**:
   - Extend URL processing to detect and extract recipe images from web pages
   - Implement image scraping using BeautifulSoup to find recipe-related images
   - Add image download and validation (format, size, content type)
   - Implement image optimization and resizing for storage efficiency
   - Add image metadata extraction (dimensions, format, file size)
   - Update Recipe model to include image_url and image_metadata fields

2. **Image Upload API**:
   - Create POST /api/recipe/image endpoint for direct image uploads
   - Implement multipart/form-data handling for image files
   - Add image validation (JPEG, PNG, WebP formats, max 10MB)
   - Implement image storage with unique naming and path management
   - Add image processing pipeline (resize, optimize, generate thumbnails)

3. **Demo Frontend Image Integration**:
   - Add image upload component to edit mode interface
   - Implement image preview and crop functionality
   - Add image removal and replacement options
   - Update recipe display components to show images
   - Integrate with existing edit recipe screen functionality
   - Add drag-and-drop image upload support

4. **PDF Export Image Support**:
   - Modify HTML template system to include image placeholders
   - Update weasyprint PDF generation to embed images
   - Implement responsive image sizing for PDF layout
   - Add image quality optimization for PDF output
   - Handle RTL layout considerations for image positioning
   - Support for multiple images per recipe in PDF format

5. **Database Schema Updates**:
   - Add image-related fields to Recipe model
   - Implement image storage path management
   - Add image metadata tracking (upload date, file size, dimensions)
   - Create database migrations for new image fields
tasks.testStrategy:
1. **Backend Image Processing Tests**:
   - Test image scraping from various recipe websites
   - Verify image download and validation functionality
   - Test image optimization and resizing algorithms
   - Validate image upload API with different file formats and sizes
   - Test error handling for corrupted or invalid images

2. **Frontend Integration Tests**:
   - Test image upload component in edit mode
   - Verify image preview and crop functionality
   - Test drag-and-drop upload behavior
   - Validate image display in recipe view components
   - Test image removal and replacement workflows

3. **PDF Export Tests**:
   - Verify images appear correctly in PDF exports
   - Test image quality and sizing in PDF output
   - Validate RTL layout with images
   - Test PDF generation with multiple images per recipe
   - Verify image embedding doesn't break PDF structure

4. **Performance Tests**:
   - Test large image upload handling
   - Verify image processing doesn't block API responses
   - Test PDF generation time with image-heavy recipes
   - Validate storage space management for images

tasks.title: Time Fields Standardization Feature Summary and Documentation
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation and summary of the completed Time Fields Standardization feature that removed waitTime field and converted totalTime to computed property across backend models, service extraction, and frontend components.
tasks.details: Document the complete implementation of the time fields standardization feature including: (1) Backend model changes that removed the waitTime field and converted totalTime to a computed property based on prepTime and cookTime; (2) Service extraction updates that modified recipe parsing logic to handle the new time field structure; (3) Frontend component updates that adjusted time display and input handling; (4) Database migration scripts and data transformation procedures; (5) API endpoint modifications to support the new time field schema; (6) Impact analysis on existing recipes and user data; (7) Performance improvements gained from simplified time calculations; (8) Create comprehensive documentation covering the technical implementation, migration process, and user-facing changes; (9) Update relevant code comments and inline documentation; (10) Generate changelog entries highlighting the feature completion and benefits.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all documentation accurately reflects the implemented changes by cross-referencing with actual code modifications. Test that all time-related functionality works correctly with the new computed totalTime property. Validate that no waitTime references remain in the codebase. Confirm that existing recipes display correct time values after the standardization. Test recipe creation and editing forms to ensure proper time field handling. Verify API responses contain correct time field structure. Review migration scripts for data integrity. Validate that PDF export and other features correctly handle the new time field format.

tasks.title: Add comments attribute to recipe data models and API endpoints
tasks.description: Add a comments field to recipe data models and implement full CRUD support across all API endpoints to allow users to add, view, edit, and delete comments on recipes.
tasks.details:
Implementation involves:

1. **Backend Data Model Updates**:
   - Add comments field to Recipe model in app/models/recipe.py
   - Define Comment model with fields: id, recipe_id, user_id (optional), content, timestamp, author_name (optional)
   - Update database schema with migration for comments table
   - Add foreign key relationship between Recipe and Comment models
   - Implement comment validation (length limits, content filtering)

2. **API Endpoint Enhancements**:
   - Update GET /recipe/{id} to include comments in response
   - Add POST /recipe/{id}/comments endpoint for adding new comments
   - Add GET /recipe/{id}/comments endpoint for retrieving all comments
   - Add PUT /recipe/{id}/comments/{comment_id} for editing comments
   - Add DELETE /recipe/{id}/comments/{comment_id} for removing comments
   - Update recipe creation/update endpoints to handle comments if provided

3. **Request/Response Models**:
   - Create CommentRequest and CommentResponse Pydantic models
   - Update RecipeResponse to include comments array
   - Add pagination support for comments endpoint
   - Implement comment sorting (newest/oldest first)

4. **Database Layer**:
   - Add comment CRUD operations in repository layer
   - Implement cascading delete for comments when recipe is deleted
   - Add indexing on recipe_id for efficient comment queries
   - Add comment count aggregation for recipe listings
tasks.testStrategy:
1. **Unit Tests**:
   - Test Comment model validation with various input scenarios
   - Verify comment CRUD operations in repository layer
   - Test comment-recipe relationship constraints
   - Validate request/response model serialization

2. **Integration Tests**:
   - Test complete comment workflow: create, read, update, delete
   - Verify comments inclusion in recipe retrieval endpoints
   - Test comment pagination and sorting functionality
   - Validate error handling for invalid comment operations

3. **API Tests**:
   - Test all comment endpoints with various payloads
   - Verify proper HTTP status codes and error messages
   - Test comment permissions and authorization
   - Validate comment data persistence across requests

4. **Database Tests**:
   - Test database migrations for comments table
   - Verify foreign key constraints and cascading deletes
   - Test comment indexing and query performance
   - Validate data integrity with concurrent comment operations

tasks.title: Implement User Authentication and Profile Management System
tasks.description: Create a complete user authentication system with login/signup functionality and comprehensive user profile management capabilities.
tasks.details: Implementation should include: 1) User registration with email validation and password hashing using bcrypt or similar secure method, 2) Login system with JWT token generation and validation, 3) Password reset functionality with email-based verification, 4) Protected route middleware for authenticated endpoints, 5) User profile CRUD operations including profile picture upload, 6) Session management with token refresh capabilities, 7) Rate limiting for auth endpoints to prevent brute force attacks, 8) Input validation and sanitization for all user inputs, 9) Database schema for users table with appropriate indexes, 10) Integration with frontend authentication state management. Use industry-standard security practices including password complexity requirements, secure cookie handling, and proper error messaging that doesn't leak sensitive information.
tasks.testStrategy: Create comprehensive test suite including: 1) Unit tests for authentication middleware and password hashing functions, 2) Integration tests for registration, login, and logout endpoints, 3) Test password reset flow with mock email service, 4) Verify JWT token generation and validation, 5) Test protected routes with valid and invalid tokens, 6) Test profile CRUD operations with proper authorization, 7) Test rate limiting functionality, 8) Security testing for common vulnerabilities like SQL injection and XSS, 9) Test file upload functionality for profile pictures with proper validation, 10) End-to-end tests for complete user registration and login flows using testing framework like Cypress or Playwright.

tasks.testStrategy: Create comprehensive test coverage including: 1) Unit tests for recipe model validation and database operations, 2) Integration tests for all recipe API endpoints with various user scenarios, 3) Test recipe creation with valid and invalid data to verify validation rules, 4) Test recipe retrieval with different filtering and sorting options, 5) Verify recipe update and deletion operations with proper authorization checks, 6) Test recipe search functionality with various query combinations, 7) Test recipe sharing permissions and visibility settings, 8) Verify recipe import/export functionality with sample data files, 9) Test recipe categorization and tagging system, 10) Performance tests for recipe queries with large datasets, 11) Test recipe image upload and storage operations, 12) Verify recipe ownership and access control for different user roles
